sourceOrganization.name: NIAID OCICB BCBB
sourceOrganization.abstract: The Bioinformatics and Computational Biosciences Branch (BCBB) collection provides innovative bioinformatics tools and resources that empower researchers globally. By integrating computational data-driven science and analysis, BCBB advances biomedical research to drive breakthroughs in treatments for infectious, immunologic, and allergic diseases. For Bioinformatics Software at BCBB, visit: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/bioinformatics-software-bcbb
